channel.title: Chrome Show
channel.description: A Podcast all about Chrome OS
channel.itunes:summary: We cover every aspect of the Chrome OS and Chromebooks and the apps that power Chrome

channel.itunes:subtitle: Everything you ever wanted to know about Chrome OS and the Chromebook
channel.itunes:keywords: chromebook, chrome os, chrome, google, apps

item.title: TCS #6 The Shows Finally Back!
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: After weeks of no success, I finally found a replacement power supply for the Samsung Chrome Book. I have a link to the only one I know that is available in the show notes below. It is great to be back and I share with you some great tips. In a complete shocker I find [...]
item.content:encoded:
After weeks of no success, I finally found a replacement power supply for the Samsung Chrome Book. I have a link to the only one I know that is available in the show notes below. It is great to be back and I share with you some great tips. In a complete shocker I find out that you now can do a Hangout with your Google Chromebook. This was not possible just a few weeks ago so it is nice to see that Google has this functionality ready for us.

The Chrome Show is Part of Geek News Central and the Tech Podcast Network

item.title: TCS #5 Chromebook Issue
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: I have been on travel the past couple of weeks so my apologies for not producing the show while gone. Bit of a weird show today, because the power supply for my Chromebook crapped out of me and a replacement is inbound so I am doing the show via just the chrome browser. The Chrome [...]
item.content:encoded:
I have been on travel the past couple of weeks so my apologies for not producing the show while gone. Bit of a weird show today, because the power supply for my Chromebook crapped out of me and a replacement is inbound so I am doing the show via just the chrome browser.

item.title: TCS #3 Four Great Apps
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: I feel much better about the sustainability of this show after todays, research and coverage. What is interesting is that in pre-show research I thought I had a app that we would demo that would act funny. Well during the show it worked fine.. Just goes to show you that if the cloud has an [...]
item.content:encoded:
I feel much better about the sustainability of this show after todays, research and coverage. What is interesting is that in pre-show research I thought I had a app that we would demo that would act funny. Well during the show it worked fine.. Just goes to show you that if the cloud has an issue apps will break.

item.itunes:summary:
I feel much better about the sustainability of this show after todays, research and coverage. What is interesting is that in pre-show research I thought I had a app that we would demo that would act funny. Well during the show it worked fine.. Just goes to show you that if the cloud has an issue apps will break.

item.title: TCS #1 Introductions
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: One thing I learned doing this first show is that we need to scale the chrome screen. It is very hard to see the demo’s also I will be pre-caching pages as much as possible. There will be some bugs to work out like any new show but I hope that you enjoy the first [...]
item.content:encoded:
One thing I learned doing this first show is that we need to scale the chrome screen. It is very hard to see the demo’s also I will be pre-caching pages as much as possible. There will be some bugs to work out like any new show but I hope that you enjoy the first episode. I’ll get things fully dialed in for show #2.

item.itunes:summary:
One thing I learned doing this first show is that we need to scale the chrome screen. It is very hard to see the demo's also I will be pre-caching pages as much as possible. There will be some bugs to work out like any new show but I hope that you enjoy the first episode. I'll get things fully dialed in for show #2.

item.itunes:author: Todd Cochrane

item.title: Samsung Chromebook Unboxing
item.dc:creator: geeknews
item.description: While we are a few days away from launching the offical shows as we are waiting on some gear to tie the Chromebook into the Tricaster we did a quick unboxing recording of the Samsung Series 5 Chromebook today. I will have a lot more for your shortly, but here is a couple of things [...]
item.content:encoded:
While we are a few days away from launching the offical shows as we are waiting on some gear to tie the Chromebook into the Tricaster we did a quick unboxing recording of the Samsung Series 5 Chromebook today.

I will have a lot more for your shortly, but here is a couple of things we noticed right off the bat. The Samsung Chromebook has trouble connecting to some Wifi connections. We also received an immediate update to Chrome which took about 15 minutes to load.

Verizons mobile plans for this device run $9.95 per gb on a monthly plan. Here is the unboxing sorry for the screen glare we will get it dialed in when we patch it directly to the tricater and get a HD recording on all demos.
item.itunes:subtitle: While we are a few days away from launching the offical shows as we are waiting on some gear to tie the Chromebook into the Tricaster we did a quick unboxing recording of the Samsung Series 5 Chromebook today. - I will have a lot more for your shortly,
item.itunes:summary:
While we are a few days away from launching the offical shows as we are waiting on some gear to tie the Chromebook into the Tricaster we did a quick unboxing recording of the Samsung Series 5 Chromebook today.
I will have a lot more for your shortly, but here is a couple of things we noticed right off the bat. The Samsung Chromebook has trouble connecting to some Wifi connections. We also received an immediate update to Chrome which took about 15 minutes to load.
Verizons mobile plans for this device run $9.95 per gb on a monthly plan. Here is the unboxing sorry for the screen glare we will get it dialed in when we patch it directly to the tricater and get a HD recording on all demos.
